duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in multiple behind-the-scenes sales functions such as answering sales calls, addressing and resolving customer concerns, recommending products, and providing hands-on assistance as needed.
Present job quotes, provide accurate pricing and inventory information to customers, and work together with Sales associates to provide outstanding customer service.
Use customer relationship management (CRM) system and phone system effectively.
Assist customers on the parts counter and provide backup support in the warehouse.

education_certification.credential: 0-3 years sales and/or customer service experience preferred.
